title: Question:
author: BTC_Mouse
content: I think India will win the Asia cup in 2022. what do you think? Please vote who wins Asia cup 2022.

comments.author: Bttzed03
comments.body: You might as well add what sports this is. Judging from the countries listed, I'm assuming it's cricket.

comments.author: BTC_Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: Bttzed03 on August 29, 2022, 03:43:51 AMYou might as well add what sports this is. Judging from the countries listed, I'm assuming it's cricket.You are absolutely right it is cricket which started two days ago Asia Cup 2022.

Judging from the countries listed, I'm assuming it's cricket.You are absolutely right it is cricket which started two days ago Asia Cup 2022.Please lock this thread because we already have too many threads related to cricket in Gambling discussion section, it's just spam.

comments.author: YinShuiSiYuan
comments.body: Already there is a thread where T20 format is discussed and Asia Cup is also being discussed. You better go there and start discussion. Already we have 4 threads related to cricket here and its useless to create one more. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5102095.0
